LanguageData.OverDrive_Wait: Unable to activate overload, the system has not yet cooled.
LanguageData.OverDrive_ON: Power overload switched. If the overload is active, the station will take damage, but the armor charge is doubled. \nIf you do not turn it off before it reaches 100%, the station will receive significant damage.
LanguageData.Station_FullInfo:
To install the module, click on the empty slot.
To remove a module, click on it.

Armor parameters:
{0}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_GuidanceSystem: - extra chance to hit the target: {0}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_AdvancedFiltrationSyst: Protection against all air effects except radiation
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_Stimulants: - shock threshold reduction: {0}\n- increase movement speed: {1}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_AntitoxicSeals: Radiation protection\n- Max temperature: +30\n- Min temperature: +30
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_ActivePlates: - armor increase (sharp): {0}\n- armor increase (blunt): {1}\n- armor increase (heat): {2}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_ProteinTherapyAntigene: - shock treshold reduction: {0}\n- increase movement speed: {1}\n- carry weight: +{2}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_AdrenalineInjectors_Ac: Injects an increased amount of adrenaline, increasing all parameters of the carrier. Caution! at high dosages it can kill, and with excessive use cause heart problems
Adrenaline injectors are not ready yet.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_KineticBuffer_Action_D: Releases kinetic buffer energy by releasing a wave of energy
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_SecurityInterface: - armor increase (sharp): {0}\n- armor increase (blunt): {1}\n- armor increase (heat): {2}
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_CombatExoskeleton_Acti: Not enough energy in the suit. {0} required.
It overloads the exoskeleton, increasing the power abilities of the wearer. It takes {0} energy.
LanguageData.ArmorWorkerModule_MedicalExoskeleton_Act: It releases a large amount of a special drug that instantly heals all wounds.
The drug is not ready yet.
The drug has already been administered.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_AblationCoating: Block damage while ablation coating has charges
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_AblationCoating_Action: Shows how many charges are left in the coating. As long as there are charges, the damage will be completely reflected. Each hit destroys 1 charge.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_ShieldModulator: Reflects all damage less than or equal to 15. Requires charging, charging comes from the main reactor.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_ShieldModulator_Action: Shows the charge level of the shield. The shield charges at speed {0}. Energy is taken from the main reactor. It works even if the main reactor is turned off.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_EnergyBoots: - increase movement speed: {0}\n- increased energy consumption: +0.10
LanguageData.Station_Incopatible: The module is not compatible with this armor.
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_LowVoltageElectrifiedC: - the enemy takes damage when attacking you
LanguageData.ArmorModuleWorker_HighVoltageElectrified: - the enemy takes damage and electric shock when it attacks you
LanguageData.ArmorWorkerModule_TitaniumNeodymiumSubcu: Creates an impenetrable protective layer around the wearer
